title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document detailed requirements for the quantum encryption system, including security standards, performance targets, integration with existing banking systems, regulatory compliance, key management, and disaster recovery procedures.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components for quantum key distribution, encryption/decryption, and secure transaction processing.

title: Develop Quantum Key Distribution Module
description: Implement the quantum key distribution protocol and integrate with hardware components for secure key exchange.

title: Implement Encryption/Decryption Module
description: Develop the encryption and decryption algorithms using the quantum keys, ensuring compatibility with banking transaction formats.

title: Build Secure Transaction Processing Module
description: Develop the transaction processing component that integrates with existing banking systems and leverages the quantum encryption for secure data transmission.

title: Design User Interface
description: Create wireframes and prototypes for the user interface, ensuring a seamless experience for banking personnel to initiate and monitor secure transactions.

title: Implement User Interface
description: Develop the user interface components based on the approved designs, integrating with the backend transaction processing module.

title: Set up Development and Testing Environment
description: Configure the development and testing environments, including version control, continuous integration, and deployment pipelines.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Enforce security best practices, including access controls, audit logging, and secure coding practices throughout the development process.

title: Conduct Unit and Integration Testing
description: Write and execute comprehensive unit and integration tests to ensure the correctness and reliability of the quantum encryption system components.

title: Perform System Testing and Validation
description: Conduct end-to-end system testing, including performance, security, and compliance validation, to ensure the system meets all requirements.

title: Document System Architecture and Usage
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the system architecture, installation, configuration, and usage, including developer and user guides.

title: Deploy to Production Environment
description: Deploy the quantum encryption system to the production environment, ensuring secure integration with existing banking systems and infrastructure.
